The "[[Ubuntu]]" [[Linux distribution|distribution]] of the [[Linux]] computer [[operating system]] is inspired by the concept, based on the premise that it "brings the spirit of Ubuntu to the software world." <ref>[http://www.ubuntu.com/ Ubuntu: Linux for Human Beings]</ref><ref>[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/conduct Ubuntu: Code of Conduct]</ref>
+
The "[[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]]" [[Linux distribution|distribution]] of the [[Linux]] computer [[operating system]] is inspired by the concept, based on the premise that it "brings the spirit of Ubuntu to the software world." <ref>[http://www.ubuntu.com/ Ubuntu: Linux for Human Beings]</ref><ref>[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/conduct Ubuntu: Code of Conduct]</ref>
Former US president [[Bill Clinton]] used the term at the 2006 [[Labour Party (UK)|Labour Party]] conference in the UK to explain why society is important.<ref>{{cite news
